thread.title: Ivanka Trump Calls Barron the 'Baby Whisperer,' Shares Video of Him Calming Theodore
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Calls Barron the 'Baby Whisperer,' Shares Video of Him Calming Theodore

author: Just Jared
title: Ivanka Trump Calls Barron the 'Baby Whisperer,' Shares Video of Him Calming Theodore
text:
Ivanka Trump is sending some love and support to her 10-year-old brother Barron Trump amid all of the media attention surrounding him.
The 35-year-old First Daughter shared a video of Barron calming her nine-month-old son Theodore while their father, President Donald Trump , signed his first executive orders.
“My youngest brother proves he’s a baby whisperer—while my father signs his first executive orders,” Ivanka captioned the video on Twitter .
Ivanka ‘s longtime friend Chelsea Clinton spoke out over the weekend to defend Barron ‘s right to be a normal child while living in the White House.
My youngest brother proves he's a baby whisperer—while my father signs his first executive orders. pic.twitter.com/UqJeCcTjg3 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) January 23, 2017
